title: My Phone Keeps Shutting Off After A Few Seconds Off The Charger
content: A Few Months Ago My Phone Has Been Acting No So Great I Had a Few Crashes Here And There. Now I Can't Even Use My Phone Without The Charger Plugged In, It Can Be 100â„… But After It's Off The Charger It Shuts Off And I Have To Plug It In Again Or I Won't Even Get Pass The Google Screen. Please Help Me
